Annotation.String: This schema defines terms and types for OData server-side caching.
Comma-separated list. Indicates one or more entity-qualified structural properties for cache partitioning, e.g. Region/ID. Also ClientID may be included for pattitioning by client identitifier.
Indicates that this entity type/set will be refreshed after another specified entity type/set, as opposed to using Schedule or Timeout to indicate when this entity type/set should be refreshed.
Comma-separated list. Indicates one or more cache refresh mechanisms for this entity, chosen from the options: dcn, loadAll, loadPartition. At most one load option can be included.
Indicates a daily refresh time (time of day in UTC) for backend data that is cached by an entity container or entity set. Overrides Timeout if both are specified.
Indicates a cache expiration timeout for backend data that is cached by an entity container or entity set. Defaults to one hour.
